title: If there is no data for a series, it should display a friendly error message as a reminder.
description: When there is no data available for a series in a chart, there is currently no clear indication or error message displayed to the user. This can lead to confusion and difficulty in understanding the issue. It would be beneficial to add a friendly error message that informs the user when there is no data for a particular series.
OB: When there is no data available for a series in a chart, no error message is displayed to the user.
EB: When there is no data available for a series in a chart, a friendly error message should be displayed to the user, indicating the absence of data.
SR:
1. Create a chart.
2. Set the data definition for the chart.
3. Select a column that does not have any data.
